title: Lucozade Style Font
content:
Hi,

I'm looking for any sports style fonts similar to the custom Lucozade logo.  
Any suggestions would be much appreciated thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307105327im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LUCOZADE_1_6074.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [LUCOZADE\_1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307105327/http:/typophile.com/files/LUCOZADE_1.jpg) | 112.62 KB |
author: lucy_lou

comments.content:
Lucozade: can't find a match. Feels custom to me. Vector logo could be found [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307105327/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/logo/lucozade). Candidates for customization: [Unicod Sans MD](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307105327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mostardesign/unicod-sans), [Elephantmen CC](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307105327/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/elephantmen), [Liquorstore](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307105327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/chank/liquorstore), [Interrupt Display T4](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307105327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t4typography/interrupt-display-pro), [Fragma DST](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307105327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/fragma), **[Konkrete FTY](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307105327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/fty-konkrete)**, [Serpentine Sans ICG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307105327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/serpentine-sans), **[Trademarker FF](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307105327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-trademarker)**, **[District FF](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307105327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/district/)**, **[Earth A.D. FTY](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307105327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/earth-a-d)**, **[ARB 66 Neon FTY](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307105327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/arb-66-neon-block-jun-37-cas)**  
Lite: really don't know it... May be trying some in the previous suggestions could work as well...

Fantastic, many thanks for these!

If you have a suggestions for this one two that would be great, thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307105327im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ISOSTAR_6734.jpg)
